name: Tasty Meat
description:
The fast food restaurant Tasty Meal, "the only restaurant endorsed by god," is one of the biggest fast food restaurants in all the land. But what is the source of their burger meat? Why is god endorsing a fast food restaurant? And what's up with Tasty Mike? 

This is a pretty small game, done in a few days by yours truly.

Engine - OHRRPGCE
